pli-tv-kd20:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.2: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.4: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.5: “Alaṃ, gotami, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.7: tatiyampi kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.8: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.9: “Alaṃ, gotami, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.11: “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti—
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.12: dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.4: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī kese chedāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ yena vesālī tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.5: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṃ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.6: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.7: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhiṃ dummanaṃ assumukhiṃ rudamānaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.9: “kissa tvaṃ, gotami, sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.10: “Tathā hi pana, bhante ānanda, na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.11: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gotami, muhuttaṃ idheva tāva hohi, yāvāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācāmi mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.3: “esā, bhante, mahāpajāpati gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.4: ‘na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.5: Sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.6: “Alaṃ, ānanda, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.8: tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.9: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.10: “Alaṃ, ānanda, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.12: “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ;
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.13: yannūnāhaṃ aññenapi pariyāyena bhagavantaṃ yāceyyaṃ mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.14: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.15: “bhabbo nu kho, bhante, mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā sacchikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.16: “Bhabbo, ānanda, mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi sakadāgāmiphalampi anāgāmiphalampi arahattaphalampi sacchikātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.17: “Sace, bhante, bhabbo mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi sakadāgāmiphalampi anāgāmiphalampi arahattaphalampi sacchikātuṃ;
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.18: bahūpakārā, bhante, mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā, posikā, khīrassa dāyikā, bhagavantaṃ janettiyā kālaṅkatāya thaññaṃ pāyesi;
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.19: sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.1: “Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.3: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.4: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (1)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.5: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.6: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (2)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.7: Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṃghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.9: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (3)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.10: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.11: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā, parisaṅkāya vā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.12: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (4)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.13: Garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.14: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (5)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.15: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṃghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.16: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (6)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.17: Na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.18: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (7)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.19: Ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.20: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo. (8)
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.21: Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā hotu upasampadā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.22: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato santike aṭṭha garudhamme uggahetvā yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.23: “sace kho tvaṃ, gotami, aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇheyyāsi, sāva te bhavissati upasampadā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.24: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.25: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.26: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.27: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.28: Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṃghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.30: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.31: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.32: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā, parisaṅkāya vā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.33: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.34: Garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.35: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.36: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṃghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.37: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.38: Na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.39: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.40: Ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.41: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.42: Sace kho tvaṃ, gotami, ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇheyyāsi, sāva te bhavissati upasampadā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.43: “Seyyathāpi, bhante ānanda, itthī vā puriso vā daharo, yuvā, maṇḍanakajātiko sīsaṃnahāto uppalamālaṃ vā vassikamālaṃ vā atimuttakamālaṃ vā labhitvā ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpeyya;
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.44: evameva kho ahaṃ, bhante, ānanda ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāmi yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīye”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.3: “paṭiggahitā, bhante, mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā, upasampannā bhagavato mātucchā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.4: “Sace, ānanda, nālabhissa mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ abhavissa, vassasahassaṃ saddhammo tiṭṭheyya.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.5: Yato ca kho, ānanda, mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, na dāni, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.6: Pañceva dāni, ānanda, vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassati.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.7: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, yāni kānici kulāni bahutthikāni appapurisakāni, tāni suppadhaṃsiyāni honti corehi kumbhathenakehi;
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.8: evameva kho, ānanda, yasmiṃ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, na taṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.9: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, sampanne sālikkhette setaṭṭikā nāma rogajāti nipatati, evaṃ taṃ sālikkhettaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti;
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.10: evameva kho, ānanda, yasmiṃ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, na taṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.11: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, sampanne ucchukkhette mañjiṭṭhikā nāma rogajāti nipatati, evaṃ taṃ ucchukkhettaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti;
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.12: evameva kho, ānanda, yasmiṃ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, na taṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.13: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, puriso mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva āḷiṃ bandheyya yāvadeva udakassa anatikkamanāya;
pli-tv-kd20:1.6.14: evameva kho, ānanda, mayā paṭikacceva bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭha garudhammā paññattā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.1.1: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.1.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.1.4: Atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.1.5: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.1: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.3: evañhi bhagavatā paññattaṃ bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniyo upasampādetabbā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.4: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.8: evañhi bhagavatā paññattaṃ bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniyo upasampādetabbā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.9: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.10: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.14: evañhi bhagavatā paññattaṃ bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniyo upasampādetabbā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.15: “Yadaggena, ānanda, mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā paṭiggahitā, tadeva sā upasampannā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.16: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.17: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.19: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā anujāneyya bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikamman”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.20: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.21: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.24: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā anujāneyya bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikamman’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.25: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso, yaṃ tathāgato anujāneyya mātugāmassa abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.26: Imehi nāma, ānanda, aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammā mātugāmassa abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karissanti;
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.27: kimaṅgaṃ pana tathāgato anujānissati mātugāmassa abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikamman”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.28: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.29: “na, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.31: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.32: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.33: “yāni tāni, bhante, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāni, kathaṃ mayaṃ, bhante, tesu sikkhāpadesu paṭipajjāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.34: “Yāni tāni, gotami, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāni, yathā bhikkhū sikkhanti tathā tesu sikkhāpadesu sikkhathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.35: “Yāni pana tāni, bhante, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni, kathaṃ mayaṃ, bhante, tesu sikkhāpadesu paṭipajjāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.36: “Yāni tāni, gotami, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu sikkhathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.37: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.38: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.39: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā ekā vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpinī pahitattā vihareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.41: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya, saññogāya saṃvattanti no visaññogāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya, mahicchatāya saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, kosajjāya saṃvattanti no vīriyārambhāya, dubbharatāya saṃvattanti no subharatāya;
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.43: neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṃ satthusāsananti.
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.44: Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi—
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.45: ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya, visaññogāya saṃvattanti no saññogāya, apacayāya saṃvattanti no ācayāya, appicchatāya saṃvattanti no mahicchatāya, santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no asantuṭṭhiyā, pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya, vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti no kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti no dubbharatāya;
pli-tv-kd20:2.2.47: eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṃ satthusāsanan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ na uddisīyati.
pli-tv-kd20:6.1.8: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.1.10: “jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, idāni ime imāhi saddhiṃ abhiramissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.1.14: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo āpattiṃ na paṭikaronti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.2.14: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi bhikkhuṃ passitvā pattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā āpattiṃ paṭikaronti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.2.16: “jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, rattiṃ vimānetvā idāni khamāpentī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.2.20: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi bhikkhunīnaṃ āpattiṃ paṭiggahetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ na kariyati.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.8: Tena kho pana samayena katakammā bhikkhuniyo rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi bhikkhuṃ passitvā pattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā khamāpenti “evaṃ nūna kātabban”ti maññamānā.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.10: “jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, rattiṃ vimānetvā idāni khamāpentī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.14: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.20: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo saṃghamajjhe bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.24: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamenti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.25: Tasmiṃ kho pana adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne dissanti bhikkhuniyo kammappattāyopi āpattigāminiyopi.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.27: “sādhu, bhante, ayyāva bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ karontu, ayyāva bhikkhunīnaṃ āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇhantu;
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.28: evañhi bhagavatā paññattaṃ bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.30: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ āropetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ niyyādetuṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.31: bhikkhunīhi bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ, bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnaṃ āpattiṃ āropetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ niyyādetuṃ, bhikkhunīhi bhikkhunīnaṃ āpattiṃ paṭiggahetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.32: Tena kho pana samayena uppalavaṇṇāya bhikkhuniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ anubandhā hoti vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantī.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.37: “ahaṃ kho satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ anubandhiṃ vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantī.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.38: Tassā me muṭṭhassatiniyā gahito gahito mussati.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.39: Dukkaraṃ kho pana mātugāmena yāvajīvaṃ satthāraṃ anubandhituṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:6.3.41: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti—
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.9: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.14: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.15: ūruṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, bhikkhuniyo obhāsenti, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojenti—
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.18: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kāyo vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassetabbo, na ūru vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassetabbo, na aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassetabbaṃ, na bhikkhuniyo obhāsitabbā, na bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:9.1.20: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuṃ kaddamodakena osiñcanti—
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tassā bhikkhuniyā daṇḍakammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.14: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo kāyaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassenti, thanaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassenti, ūruṃ vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassenti, aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassenti, bhikkhū obhāsenti, bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sampayojenti—
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.17: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā kāyo vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassetabbo …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.18: na thano vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassetabbo, na ūru vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassetabbo, na aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ dassetabbaṃ, na bhikkhū obhāsitabbā, na bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sampayojetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:9.2.20: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tassā bhikkhuniyā daṇḍakammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.2: “kappati nu kho ovādaṭṭhapitāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ uposathaṃ kātuṃ, na nu kho kappatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.4: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādaṭṭhapitāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ uposatho kātabbo, yāva na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.5: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ovādaṃ ṭhapetvā cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.7: “kathañhi nāma ayyo udāyī ovādaṃ ṭhapetvā cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.11: Tena kho pana samayena bālā abyattā ovādaṃ ṭhapenti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.15: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ovādaṃ ṭhapenti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.19: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ovādaṃ ṭhapetvā vinicchayaṃ na denti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.21: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādaṃ ṭhapetvā vinicchayo na dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.5: Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṃgho ovādaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.7: “jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, idāni ime imāhi saddhiṃ abhiramissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.11: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhi pañcahi bhikkhunīhi ovādaṃ gantun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.12: Tena kho pana samayena catasso pañca bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.14: “jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, idāni ime imāhi saddhiṃ abhiramissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.16: “Na, bhikkhave, catūhi pañcahi bhikkhunīhi ovādo gantabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.18: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ gantuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.19: Ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.20: ‘bhikkhunisaṃgho, ayya, bhikkhusaṃghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati;
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.22: Tena bhikkhunā pātimokkhuddesako upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.23: ‘bhikkhunisaṃgho, bhante, bhikkhusaṃghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati;
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.27: Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.28: ‘itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṃgho upasaṅkamatū’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.29: Sace na hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.31: Sace koci ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ, so ca hoti aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato, sammannitvā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.32: ‘itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṃgho upasaṅkamatū’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.33: Sace na koci ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.34: ‘natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṃgho sampādetū’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ovādaṃ na gaṇhanti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bālo hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.14: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ, avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.15: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.24: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ, ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ, avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.25: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gamiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.32: ṭhapetvā bālaṃ, ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ, avasesehi ovādo gahetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.34: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ, ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ, ṭhapetvā gamikaṃ, avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.35: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu araññe viharati.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.42: ṭhapetvā bālaṃ, ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ, ṭhapetvā gamikaṃ, avasesehi ovādo gahetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.44: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññikena bhikkhunā ovādaṃ gahetuṃ, saṅketañca kātuṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.46: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ovādaṃ gahetvā na ārocenti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.50: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ovādaṃ gahetvā na paccāharanti.
pli-tv-kd20:9.5.54: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo saṅketaṃ na gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dīghāni kāyabandhanāni dhārenti, teheva phāsukā nāmenti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.1.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā ekapariyākataṃ kāyabandhanaṃ, na ca tena phāsukā nāmetabbā.
pli-tv-kd20:10.1.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vilīvena paṭṭena phāsukā nāmenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.1.22: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā vilīvena paṭṭena phāsukā nāmetabbā …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhillena jaghanaṃ ghaṃsāpenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.2.2: gohanukena jaghanaṃ koṭṭāpenti, hatthaṃ koṭṭāpenti, hatthakocchaṃ koṭṭāpenti, pādaṃ koṭṭāpenti, pādakocchaṃ koṭṭāpenti, ūruṃ koṭṭāpenti, mukhaṃ koṭṭāpenti, dantamaṃsaṃ koṭṭāpenti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo mukhaṃ ālimpanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.3.2: mukhaṃ ummaddenti, mukhaṃ cuṇṇenti, manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañchenti, aṅgarāgaṃ karonti, mukharāgaṃ karonti, aṅgarāgamukharāgaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.3.7: na mukhaṃ ummadditabbaṃ, na mukhaṃ cuṇṇetabbaṃ, na manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañchetabbaṃ, na aṅgarāgo kātabbo, na mukharāgo kātabbo, na aṅgarāgamukharāgo kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avaṅgaṃ karonti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.2: visesakaṃ karonti, olokanakena olokenti, sāloke tiṭṭhanti;
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.3: naccaṃ kārāpenti, vesiṃ vuṭṭhāpenti, pānāgāraṃ ṭhapenti, sūnaṃ ṭhapenti, āpaṇaṃ pasārenti, vaḍḍhiṃ payojenti, vaṇijjaṃ payojenti, dāsaṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, dāsiṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, kammakāraṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, kammakāriṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, tiracchānagataṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, harītakapakkikaṃ pakiṇanti, namatakaṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.8: na visesakaṃ kātabbaṃ, na olokanakena oloketabbaṃ, na sāloke ṭhātabbaṃ, na naccaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ, na vesī vuṭṭhāpetabbā, na pānāgāraṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, na sūnā ṭhapetabbā, na āpaṇo pasāretabbo, na vaḍḍhi payojetabbā, na vaṇijjā payojetabbā, na dāso upaṭṭhāpetabbo, na dāsī upaṭṭhāpetabbā, na kammakāro upaṭṭhāpetabbo, na kammakārī upaṭṭhāpetabbā, na tiracchānagato upaṭṭhāpetabbo, na harītakapakkikaṃ pakiṇitabbaṃ, na namatakaṃ dhāretabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sabbanīlakāni cīvarāni dhārenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.2: sabbapītakāni cīvarāni dhārenti, sabbalohitakāni cīvarāni dhārenti, sabbamañjiṭṭhikāni cīvarāni dhārenti, sabbakaṇhāni cīvarāni dhārenti, sabbamahāraṅgarattāni cīvarāni dhārenti, sabbamahānāmarattāni cīvarāni dhārenti, acchinnadasāni cīvarāni dhārenti, dīghadasāni cīvarāni dhārenti, pupphadasāni cīvarāni dhārenti, phaladasāni cīvarāni dhārenti, kañcukaṃ dhārenti, tirīṭakaṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.9: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī kālaṃ karontī evamāha—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.11: Tattha bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca vivadanti—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.14: “Bhikkhunī ce, bhikkhave, kālaṃ karontī evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.15: ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro saṃghassa hotū’ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhusaṃgho, bhikkhunisaṃghassevetaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.17: sāmaṇerī ce, bhikkhave, kālaṃ karontī evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.18: ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro saṃghassa hotū’ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhusaṃgho, bhikkhunisaṃghassevetaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.19: Bhikkhu ce, bhikkhave, kālaṃ karonto evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.20: ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro saṃghassa hotū’ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhunisaṃgho, bhikkhusaṃghassevetaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.24: añño ce, bhikkhave, koci kālaṃ karonto evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.25: ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro saṃghassa hotū’ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhunisaṃgho, bhikkhusaṃghassevetan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.26: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī purāṇamallī bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.27: Sā rathikāya dubbalakaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā aṃsakūṭena pahāraṃ datvā pātesi.
pli-tv-kd20:10.5.33: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuṃ passitvā dūratova okkamitvā maggaṃ dātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī pavutthapatikā jārena gabbhinī hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.2: Sā gabbhaṃ pātetvā kulūpikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.4: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī taṃ gabbhaṃ patte pakkhipitvā saṅghāṭiyā paṭicchādetvā agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena piṇḍacārikena bhikkhunā samādānaṃ kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.6: “yāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhaṃ labhissāmi, na taṃ adatvā bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā paribhuñjissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.7: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuniṃ passitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.11: tatiyampi kho so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.15: ‘yāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhaṃ labhissāmi, na taṃ adatvā bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā paribhuñjissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.17: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tena bhikkhunā nippīḷiyamānā nīharitvā pattaṃ dassesi—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.20: Atha kho so bhikkhu ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.22: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.23: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd20:13.1.28: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuṃ passitvā nīharitvā pattaṃ dassetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuṃ passitvā parivattetvā pattamūlaṃ dassenti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuṃ passitvā parivattetvā pattamūlaṃ dassessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.5: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuṃ passitvā parivattetvā pattamūlaṃ dassetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuṃ passitvā ukkujjitvā pattaṃ dassetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.8: Yañca patte āmisaṃ hoti, tena ca bhikkhu nimantetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.9: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ rathikāya purisabyañjanaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.13: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.14: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd20:13.2.16: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhūnaṃ āmisaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ aññesaṃ dassanti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.7: “Na, bhikkhave, attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ aññesaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ āmisaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.15: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhikataṃ āmisaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.17: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhunīnaṃ āmisaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ aññesaṃ dassanti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.7: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ aññesaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunīnaṃ āmisaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.15: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunīnaṃ sannidhikataṃ āmisaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.17: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhūhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:16.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ ussannaṃ hoti, bhikkhunīnaṃ na hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:16.1.3: “sādhu, bhante, ayyā amhākaṃ senāsanaṃ dentu tāvakālikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena utuniyo bhikkhuniyo onaddhamañcaṃ onaddhapīṭhaṃ abhinisīdantipi abhinipajjantipi.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.4: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā onaddhamañcaṃ onaddhapīṭhaṃ abhinisīditabbaṃ abhinipajjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.5: Yā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.16: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sabbakālaṃ kaṭisuttakaṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.24: Tena kho pana samayena upasampannāyo dissanti—
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.25: animittāpi, nimittamattāpi, alohitāpi, dhuvalohitāpi, dhuvacoḷāpi, paggharantīpi, sikharaṇīpi, itthipaṇḍakāpi, vepurisikāpi, sambhinnāpi, ubhatobyañjanāpi.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.27: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādentiyā catuvīsati antarāyike dhamme pucchituṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.29: ‘nasi animittā, nasi nimittamattā, nasi alohitā, nasi dhuvalohitā, nasi dhuvacoḷā, nasi paggharantī, nasi sikharaṇī, nasi itthipaṇḍakā, nasi vepurisikā, nasi sambhinnā, nasi ubhatobyañjanā?
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.32: Manussāsi, itthīsi, bhujissāsi, aṇaṇāsi, nasi rājabhaṭī?
pli-tv-kd20:16.2.34: Paripuṇṇavīsativassāsi, paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvaraṃ, kiṃnāmāsi, kānāmā te pavattinī’”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ antarāyike dhamme pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.2: Upasampadāpekkhāyo vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekatoupasampannāya bhikkhunisaṃghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṃghe upasampādetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ananusiṭṭhā upasampadāpekkhāyo antarāyike dhamme pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.6: Upasampadāpekkhāyo vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ anusāsitvā pacchā antarāyike dhamme pucchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.10: Upasampadāpekkhāyo tatheva vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.12: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekamantaṃ anusāsitvā saṃghamajjhe antarāyike dhamme pucchituṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.2.16: ‘ayaṃ te patto, ayaṃ saṅghāṭi, ayaṃ uttarāsaṅgo, ayaṃ antaravāsako, idaṃ saṅkaccikaṃ, ayaṃ udakasāṭikā;
pli-tv-kd20:17.3.2: Duranusiṭṭhā upasampadāpekkhāyo vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.3.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya anusāsitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.4.7: attanā vā attānaṃ sammannitabbaṃ, parāya vā parā sammannitabbā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.4.12: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.4.18: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmā itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.1: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā upasampadāpekkhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.4: Yaṃ jātaṃ taṃ saṃghamajjhe pucchante santaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ, asantaṃ natthīti vattabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.5: Mā kho vitthāyi, mā kho maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.7: nasi animittā, nasi nimittamattā, nasi alohitā, nasi dhuvalohitā, nasi dhuvacoḷā, nasi paggharantī, nasi sikharaṇī, nasi itthipaṇḍakā, nasi vepurisikā, nasi sambhinnā, nasi ubhatobyañjanā?
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.10: Manussāsi, itthīsi, bhujissāsi, aṇaṇāsi, nasi rājabhaṭī?
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.12: Paripuṇṇavīsativassāsi, paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvaraṃ, kiṃnāmāsi, kānāmā te pavattinī’ti?
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.21: Ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā upasampadaṃ yācāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.23: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayye, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.25: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayye, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:17.5.27: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayye, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.6.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ antarāyike dhamme puccheyyanti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.6.7: Yaṃ jātaṃ taṃ pucchāmi santaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ, asantaṃ natthīti vattabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.5: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.6: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyya itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.11: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.12: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeti itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.13: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.20: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.21: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeti itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.22: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.24: Upasampannā saṃghena itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.7.25: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.1: Tāvadeva taṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā upasampadaṃ yācāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.5: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.6: Ahaṃ, ayyā, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya upasampadāpekkhā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.9: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.10: Ahaṃ, ayyā, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya upasampadāpekkhā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.13: Ullumpatu maṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.18: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.19: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyya, itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.24: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.26: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya pavattiniyā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.33: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.35: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya pavattiniyā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.38: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.39: Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā, utuppamāṇaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ, divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo, saṅgīti ācikkhitabbā, bhikkhuniyo vattabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.40: imissā tayo ca nissaye, aṭṭha ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkheyyāthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.41: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhattagge āsanaṃ saṅkasāyantiyo kālaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.43: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, avasesānaṃ yathāgatikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.45: “bhagavatā anuññātaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, avasesānaṃ yathāgatikan”ti—
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.46: sabbattha aṭṭheva bhikkhuniyo yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhanti, avasesāyo yathāgatikaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:17.8.48: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhattagge aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, avasesānaṃ yathāgatikaṃ;
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo na pavārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo attanā pavāretvā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ na pavārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.7: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā attanā pavāretvā bhikkhusaṃgho na pavāretabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato pavārentiyo kolāhalaṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.11: “Na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato pavāretabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.13: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purebhattaṃ pavārentiyo kālaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.18: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ajjatanā bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ pavāretvā aparajju bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pavāretun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṃgho pavārento kolāhalaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ paṭibalaṃ sammannituṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.6: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunī yācitabbā, yācitvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.8: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya bhikkhunisaṃghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.11: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammannati bhikkhunisaṃghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.12: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā sammuti bhikkhunisaṃghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pavāretuṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.14: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī bhikkhunisaṃghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.2.15: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.1: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.3: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.4: Vadatu, ayyā, bhikkhusaṃgho bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissati.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.7: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā, parisaṅkāya vā.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.8: Vadatu, ayyā, bhikkhusaṃgho bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ uposathaṃ ṭhapenti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapenti, savacanīyaṃ karonti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapenti, okāsaṃ kārenti, codenti, sārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.32: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ uposathaṃ ṭhapenti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapenti, savacanīyaṃ karonti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapenti, okāsaṃ kārenti, codenti, sārenti.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.55: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyanti—
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.62: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti, na sakkoti padasā gantuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:19.3.69: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā yānugghātena bāḷhataraṃ aphāsu ahosi.
pli-tv-kd20:22.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aḍḍhakāsī gaṇikā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.1.12: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd20:22.2.11: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya dūtena upasampādetunti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.1: Tāya dūtāya bhikkhuniyā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.6: Ullumpatu taṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.10: Dutiyampi, ayyā, itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.11: Ullumpatu taṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.15: Tatiyampi, ayyā, itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.16: Ullumpatu taṃ, ayyā, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.22: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.23: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyya itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.29: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.31: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya pavattiniyā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.39: Itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmāya pavattiniyā.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.41: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmāya upasampadā itthannāmāya pavattiniyā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.44: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.45: Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā, utuppamāṇaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ, divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo, saṅgīti ācikkhitabbā, bhikkhuniyo vattabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.46: tassā tayo ca nissaye, aṭṭha ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkheyyāthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.47: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo araññe viharanti.
pli-tv-kd20:22.3.52: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena bhikkhunisaṃghassa uddosito dinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī sannisinnagabbhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.4: “kathaṃ nu kho mayā imasmiṃ dārake paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.6: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, posetuṃ, yāva so dārako viññutaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.8: “mayā ca na labbhā ekikāya vatthuṃ, aññāya ca bhikkhuniyā na labbhā dārakena saha vatthuṃ, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.10: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammannitvā tassā bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.12: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunī yācitabbā, yācitvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.14: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.17: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammannati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.18: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā sammuti itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.20: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyā.
pli-tv-kd20:25.1.21: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:25.2.1: Atha kho tassā dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd20:25.2.2: “kathaṃ nu kho mayā imasmiṃ dārake paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:25.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā sāgāraṃ yathā aññasmiṃ purise paṭipajjanti evaṃ tasmiṃ dārake paṭipajjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannā hoti mānattacārinī.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.3: “mayā ca na labbhā ekikāya vatthuṃ, aññāya ca bhikkhuniyā na labbhā saha mayā vatthuṃ, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.5: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammannitvā tassā bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.7: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunī yācitabbā, yācitvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.12: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammannati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.13: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā sammuti itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.15: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dutiyā.
pli-tv-kd20:25.3.16: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:26.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd20:26.1.2: Sā puna paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd20:26.1.5: yadeva sā vibbhantā tadeva sā abhikkhunī”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:26.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sakāvāsā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkami.
pli-tv-kd20:26.2.2: Sā puna paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd20:26.2.4: “Yā sā, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī sakāvāsā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purisehi abhivādanaṃ, kesacchedanaṃ, nakhacchedanaṃ, vaṇappaṭikammaṃ, kukkuccāyantā na sādiyanti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo pallaṅkena nisīdanti paṇhisamphassaṃ sādiyantī.
pli-tv-kd20:27.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.2.6: Tassā vinā pallaṅkena na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vaccakuṭiyā vaccaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.3.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, heṭṭhā vivaṭe uparipaṭicchanne vaccaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo cuṇṇena nahāyanti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.8: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vāsitakāya mattikāya nahāyanti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.15: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo jantāghare nahāyantiyo kolāhalaṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.19: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paṭisote nahāyanti dhārāsamphassaṃ sādiyantī.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.23: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo atitthe nahāyanti.
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.28: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purisatitthe nahāyanti.
